description: Properly define Refine resources for all admin entities following https://refine.dev/core/docs/data/data-provider/#usage-1. Configure resources in data provider for: User, AuditLog, Notification, Document (admin view), UsageRecord, SubscriptionPlan. Each resource should map to nestjs-query auto-generated CRUD operations. Define resource names, list of standard operations (getList, getOne, create, update, delete). Enable fine-grained access control if needed. This establishes the foundation for all admin CRUD pages to use standard Refine patterns.
